title: Instruction Following
description: Accurately follow natural-language instructions, respecting all constraints (length, tone, format, content) on the first try. Understands intent, plans steps, and delivers precisely as requested.
useCase: Auto-generate a weekly financial report: Reads raw data, outputs Markdown with a brief summary (‚â§150 words), metrics table, formal tone, meeting all constraints perfectly on the first attempt.
commentary: Precision is key for business value. LLMs are smart, but true impact comes from doing *exactly* what's asked. This cuts rework, reduces compliance risks, and accelerates workflows.

title: Computer Use
description: Lets AI agents understand instructions and operate GUIs (browsers, desktop apps) autonomously. Navigates websites, interacts with UI elements, extracts info, and completes multi-step tasks.
useCase: Book a flight: Given 'Find cheapest direct LHR-JFK flight next Tuesday PM', agent opens site, searches, filters, selects best option, proceeds to booking (pausing for user confirmation).
commentary: Unlocks automation by letting AI *do* tasks. Potential to revolutionize workflows, accessibility, and assistance, though reliability across diverse interfaces is still improving.

title: Tool Use
description: Use various tools like code interpreters and external APIs.
useCase: Executing code, retrieving data, or calling external services.
commentary: Greatly expands LLM capabilities by connecting to external systems and data sources.

title: Reasoning
description: Apply logical and complex reasoning skills to solve problems.
useCase: Solving multi-step problems requiring logical inference and analysis.
commentary: Strength varies across domains with math and science reasoning continually improving.

title: Image Generation
description: Analyzes, modifies, and creates images from textual prompts.
useCase: Generating artwork, concept art, photo editing, object recognition.
commentary: Rapidly evolving field with increasingly realistic and complex outputs.
